msgSnippet: Take a look at junit.extensions.TestSetup. This class is explicitly available for this case.

Take a look at junit.extensions.TestSetup. This class is explicitly
available for this case.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Grant Lewis [mailto:lewis@...]
>Sent: Monday, June 25, 2001 10:10 PM
>To: JUnit
>Subject: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
>
>
>Can somebody help explain how to setup a TestCase so the setUp 
>method is
>executed once for all the tests. I posed this question a week or so ago
>a and never received a reply with sufficient detail explaining 
>how to do
>it. Somebody suggested I look at the TestSetup class in the extensions
>package, but I didn't get very far with that approach.
>
>Any help appreciated.
>
>Grant
>

subject: RE: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
